constituent: spindle, metal, gold, droop, drop, silage, walking cane, stick, one, floor
koohiiStory1: Wasn´t it a cursed spindle that Sleeping Beauty pricked her finger on? Therefore the spindle was the metal that caused her to droop and eventually sleep for 100 years.
koohiiStory2: Spindle: the needle that drops on an LP record player. This is made of metal. It droops. Viola.
